fields.label: 1) What is the primary purpose of the Manufacturing Module in ERPNext?

fields.description:

B) BOM (Bill of Materials)

fields.label: 3) Which of the following is required to create a Manufacturing Order in ERPNext?

fields.description:
A) The cost price of raw materials
B) The list of raw materials required to manufacture a product
C) The list of finished goods
D) The production schedule for an item
fields.label: 2) In ERPNext, a Bill of Materials (BOM) is used to define:
A Manufacturing Order (MO) in ERPNext is created automatically when a Sales Order is placed.
In ERPNext, you can set multiple manufacturing workstations to produce the same item.

fields.description: The response needs to be longer than 50 characters.
